mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", b.mobile AS "user.mobile", b.email AS "user.email", a.name AS "name", a.title AS "title", a.photo AS "photo", a.type AS "type", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
left join sys_user b on b.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teachers( id, user_id, name, title, photo, type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{name}, #{title}, #{photo}, #{type}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE teachers SET user_id = #{user.id}, name = #{name}, title = #{title}, photo = #{photo}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
